cards.title: The Simurgh
setup: Put {TheSimurghCharacter} into play, 'The Strategist' side up. Set all Condition cards aside as the Condition deck. Shuffle all Trap cards and put the top {H} into play face down. Put the other Trap cards off to the side.
gameplay: At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the Condition deck. Then, reveal the top {H - 1} cards of the villain deck. Put the revealed cards back in ascending order of {SimurghDanger}.
At the end of the villain turn, {TheSimurghCharacter} deals the hero with the highest HP {H - 1} projectile damage. Then, if there are no face-down villain cards, flip this card.
advanced: At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the Condition deck.
flippedGameplay: At the start of the villain turn, reveal the top {H + 1} cards of the villain deck. Put the revealed cards back in ascending order of {SimurghDanger}.
At the end of the villain turn, put a Scream token on this card. Then, this card deals each hero target X psychic damage, where X is the number of Scream tokens on this card.
flippedAdvanced: At the end of the villain turn, put a Trap card from off to the side into play

cards.title: A Capability Revealed
body: Destroy all Equipment cards. Reveal the top X cards of the villain deck, where X is the number of cards destroyed this way. Put the revealed cards back in ascending order of {SimurghDanger}.
cards.flavorText: Pieces of machinery began to{BR}flow out of a gaping hole in the side{BR}of the building nearest where she'd{BR}landed, stopping when they reached{BR}her immediate vicinity.

cards.title: A Countermeasure Defeated
body: Reveal the top {H} cards of the villain trash. Play the revealed card with the lowest {SimurghDanger}.
cards.flavorText: Telekinesis.{BR}She'd created a false image of herself{BR}out of snow and ice, baiting Scion away.

cards.title: A Crucial Hesitation
body: This card is indestructible.{BR}When this card is flipped face up put {8 - H} tokens on it. If this card ever has no tokens on it, the heroes lose the game.
At the end of the villain turn remove a token from this card.
At the end of each hero turn if they have done at most one of play a card / use a power / draw a card put a token on this card.
cards.flavorText: The bubble-man formed{BR}another shield around himself,{BR}but he left his companion out of it.

cards.title: A Defence Penetrated
body: Damage that would be dealt to hero targets cannot be redirected.
This card is indestructible.
cards.flavorText: The resulting shards and flakes{BR}of crystal turned around in the air{BR}and condensed in a thick shell{BR}around the force field.

cards.title: A Fate Selected
body: {TheSimurghCharacter} deals the hero with the fewest cards in play {H} sonic damage.
cards.flavorText: The result is hallucinations,{BR}momentary or sustained. Hearing sounds,{BR}seeing things, smelling something,{BR}where none truly exist.

cards.title: A Million Coincidences
body: The Simurgh deals 1 projectile damage to all hero targets H-1 times.
The environment deals 1 irreducible melee damage to all hero targets H-2 times.
cards.flavorText: Not one second after the barrier{BR}was in place, a pair of heroes{BR}flew around the corner.

cards.title: A Plan Enacted
body: If there are no face-down villain cards in play, play the top card of the villain deck.
Otherwise, flip a face-down villain card, then shuffle this card into the villain deck
cards.flavorText: He glanced over his shoulder,{BR}saw the various components of the{BR}circle crackling with current as it rose{BR}behind the Simurgh,{BR}like a gargantuan halo.

cards.title: A Reckoning Long Delayed
body: When this card is flipped face up the hero with the lowest HP deals the hero with the highest HP 5 irreducible projectile damage.
This card is indestructible.
cards.flavorText: An obstacle must be removed.{BR}This is critical, but she is blind to it.{BR}This is the greatest problem she faces.

cards.title: A Response Prepared
body: When this card is revealed, play it.
Destroy all hero Ongoing cards.
cards.flavorText: Pretercognition. Spread out{BR}over several targets at once.{BR}Each target is conceptualized in the{BR}context of twelve to eighty years{BR}of history.

cards.title: A Strength Turned to Weakness
body: Whenever a hero target deals more than {8 - H} damage, that target deals itself 1 melee damage.
This card is indestructible.

flavorQuotes.text: It's going to backfire.{BR}I've said it before, I'll say it now,{BR}and I'll remind you all I said it{BR}with every chance I get until the day I die.{BR}It's going to backfire.

cards.title: A Terrible Defeat
body: When this card is flipped face up destroy every non-character card owned by the hero with the most cards in play.
This card is indestructible.
cards.flavorText: The indistinct and distant{BR}noises of the heroes firing on the{BR}Simurgh had stopped all at once,{BR}as the heroes were killed or{BR}left reeling from the aftershock.

cards.title: A Threat Foreseen
body: The first time {TheSimurghCharacter} would be dealt damage each round, redirect that damage to the hero with the lowest HP.
cards.flavorText: Possibilities, as another{BR}jumble of images. These clarify{BR}as the others do, as eventualities{BR}are discarded, the targets around her{BR}coming into focus.

cards.title: A Tragic End
body: When this card is flipped face up, destroy all non-character card targets. {TheSimurghCharacter} deals each hero target X projectile damage, where X is the number of targets destroyed this way.
This card is indestructible.
cards.flavorText: A tide of snow and ice{BR}hit him like a truck,{BR}driving him into the ragged{BR}edge of the building.

cards.title: An Ambush Laid
body: When this card is revealed, play it.
{TheSimurghCharacter} deals each hero target X fire damage, where X is the number of face-up Trap cards plus 1.
cards.flavorText: The various fragments, the{BR}little things, the bodies and pieces{BR}of furniture, they became part of{BR}a protective maelstrom around{BR}the Simurgh.

cards.title: An Environment Chosen
body: Play the top {H} cards of the environment deck.
cards.flavorText: Frame a situation to put a target{BR}under optimal fear and stress.{BR}Hormone secretions increase.

cards.title: An Unpleasant Discovery
body: At the start of the villain turn, name a keyword. Reveal the top 2 cards of each hero deck. Replace each card with the named keyword and discard the rest.
Whenever a hero card is discarded, that hero deals themself 1 psychic damage.
This card is indestructible.

flavorQuotes.text: If she's answering questions for us,{BR}we don't want to know.

cards.title: A Backup Sabotaged
body: If any hero has 2 cards in hand with the same name, flip a face-down villain card and remove this card from the game.
cards.flavorText: The heroes had cut the power,{BR}and the Simurgh was [b]still[/b] managing{BR}to activate the thing.

cards.title: An Unfortunate Malfunction
body: If there are at least {H} Equipment cards in play, flip a face-down villain card and remove this card from the game.
cards.flavorText: She requires access to{BR}particular information.{BR}This can be arranged by{BR}positioning targets carefully.

cards.title: An Attack Expected
body: If {TheSimurghCharacter} was dealt damage last round, flip a face-down villain card and remove this card from the game.
cards.flavorText: She must be unmolested.{BR}This is given freely to her.

cards.title: A Surfeit of Options
body: If there are at least {H} Ongoing cards in play, flip a face-down villain card and remove this card from the game.

cards.title: A Wealth of Targets
body: If there are at least {H} non-character card targets in play, flip a face-down villain card and remove this card from the game.
cards.flavorText: With study and precision,{BR}each ball can find its pocket.{BR}Spheres of resin meet a ledge covered{BR}by wool, perching on the edge{BR}as they spend their momentum.
